sn35.129:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
sn35.129:4.2: Atha kho ghosito gahapati yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.129:4.3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho ghosito gahapati āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.129:4.5: Kittāvatā nu kho, bhante, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti?
sn35.129:4.6: “Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca manāpā, cakkhuviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.8: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca amanāpā, cakkhuviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.10: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, cakkhudhātu, rūpā ca manāpā upekkhāvedaniyā, cakkhuviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.11: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā … pe …
sn35.129:4.12: saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca manāpā, jivhāviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.14: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca amanāpā, jivhāviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.16: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, jivhādhātu, rasā ca upekkhāvedaniyā, jivhāviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.17: Phassaṃ paṭicca uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā … pe …
sn35.129:4.18: saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca manāpā, manoviññāṇañca sukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.20: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca amanāpā, manoviññāṇañca dukkhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.22: Saṃvijjati kho, gahapati, manodhātu, dhammā ca upekkhāvedaniyā, manoviññāṇañca adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ.
sn35.129:4.24: Ettāvatā kho, gahapati, dhātunānattaṃ vuttaṃ bhagavatā”ti.
